attributes.action: immigrants should be in the country for at least 5 years before that are able to claim benefits including using the NHS service
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: everyone in britain should have to work and live a minimum of 5 years in the country before they can clam benefits or use the NHS. Due to the lack of beds in the hospital my midwife told me that i should have a home birth, I asked why and i was told due to the ammount of immigrants entering the country there are not enough beds in hospitals to accomodate people.

rejection.details: Please supply full name and address information.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
